metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1270 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.Description:
Spring Framework, versions 5.0 prior to 5.0.5 and versions 4.3 prior to4.3.15 and older unsupported versions, allow applications to expose STOMPover WebSocket endpoints with a simple, in-memory STOMP broker through thespring-messaging module. A malicious user (or attacker) can craft a messageto the broker that can lead to a remote code execution attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1270` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspring-aop-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-beans-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-context-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-context-support-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-core-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-expression-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-instrument-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-jdbc-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-jms-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-messaging-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-orm-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-oxm-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-test-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-transaction-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-web-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-web-portlet-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
libspring-web-servlet-java - 4.3.22-1~18.04
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.22-1~18.04').
